meanings.definition: The fusion or growing together of different plant parts.
meanings.sent1: The adnation of the petals created a beautiful flower.
meanings.sent2: The adnation of the roots helped the plant absorb nutrients efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The adnation of the leaves made the tree look like a green umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The adnation of the branches symbolized unity in nature.
meanings.sent5: The adnation of the stems made the plant stronger and more resilient.

meanings.definition: The fusion or growing together of different animal parts.
meanings.sent1: The adnation of the bones in the skeleton provided structure and support.
meanings.sent2: The adnation of the muscles allowed the animal to move smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The adnation of the fur on the animal's body kept it warm in the winter.
meanings.sent4: The adnation of the scales on the reptile's skin shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The adnation of the feathers on the bird's wings enabled it to soar through the sky.
